Class VectorQuantizer: wrapper for vector quantization, isolates non-fp16 compatible parts for AMP (automatic mixed precision). Takes a quantizer module that returns quantized representation, loss, and index-based representation. Provides embed, forward, quantize helpers.

So summary: A wrapper class that encapsulates a quantizer module to perform vector quantization while separating operations incompatible with half-precision, facilitating mixed-precision training.

Business intent: Enable stable training of models using automatic mixed precision by handling quantization steps that require full precision, providing easy access to embedding and quantization functions.

Keywords: vector quantization, mixed precision, AMP, wrapper, quantizer module, embedding, loss, index representation, PyTorch, neural network, fp16 isolation.
